channel.title: Another buggy message
channel.description:
#### What happened? I played Drunk and recieved message that someone tried to occupy me. There were me (Drunk), Evil King, Inquisitor and Physician. So noone had ability to occupy.
#### What was SUPPOSED to happen? That message had to not appear.

item.title: Another buggy message
item.dc:creator: beo
item.description:
What happened?

I played Drunk and recieved message that someone tried to occupy me. There were me (Drunk), Evil King, Inquisitor and Physician. So noone had ability to occupy.

What was SUPPOSED to happen?

That message had to not appear.
